item.title: Adding killcount help
item.dc:creator: @iatchi1019 iatchi1019
item.description:
@iatchi1019 wrote:

im adding godwars to my server annd the npcs wont add to the killcount or do anything they should except drop items. heres my code

} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 871 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 852 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 113 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 114 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 115 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 270 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 2050 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 2051 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false) { npcs[i].actionTimer = 0; client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[GetNpcKiller(i)]; c.BandoskillCount += 1; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 96 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 97 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 141 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 142 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 1951 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 1952 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 1953 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 1954 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 1955 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 1956 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false) { npcs[i].actionTimer = 0; client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[GetNpcKiller(i)]; c.ArmadylkillCount += 1; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1264 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false) { npcs[i].actionTimer = 0; client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[GetNpcKiller(i)]; c.SarakillCount += 1; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 709 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 1220 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 1223 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 1225 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 1007 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 190 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 189 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 188 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 1198 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 1619 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 1030 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 1033 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 1034 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 1248 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 1250 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 1246 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false || npcs[i].npcType == 1244 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false) { npcs[i].actionTimer = 0; client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[GetNpcKiller(i)]; c.ZamykillCount += 1; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2169 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false) { npcs[i].actionTimer = 0; client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[GetNpcKiller(i)]; c.teleportToX = 2879; c.teleportToY = 10233; c.addItem(Item2.bandb(), 1); } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2679 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false) { npcs[i].actionTimer = 0; client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[GetNpcKiller(i)]; c.teleportToX = 2879; c.teleportToY = 10233; c.addItem(Item2.armb(), 1); } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 5 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false) { npcs[i].actionTimer = 0; client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[GetNpcKiller(i)]; c.teleportToX = 2879; c.teleportToY = 10233; c.addItem(Item2.zamyb(), 1); } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 3001 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false) { npcs[i].actionTimer = 0; client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[GetNpcKiller(i)]; c.teleportToX = 2879; c.teleportToY = 10233; c.addItem(Item2.sarab(), 1);
